name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: AIR MATH - Homework Helper (Solver on Web)

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Crops out the questions from your screen to AIR MATH

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Stuck on complicated math homework?
Dealing with a hard geometry assignment?
Need not worry!

AIR MATH is now available on the web 🕸️ as well!
We have added it as a Chrome extension,
Solely for your convenience.

You’re just one 🖱️ click away
From searching for answers to your math problems!
This AI-integrated app will help you solve all your math questions;
From algebra to calculus.

Snap your math problem and our AI tech will search for the accurate solution in no time. Just simply take a screenshot of your desired math problem, click on the search button, and get your answers in a zap! It’s fast and simple!

That's not all! For a more elaborate step-by-step solution, expert math tutors from around the world are here to give explanations via live chat! You can log on to your account straight from the web and your questions and answers will be linked automatically to the mobile app.

You Ask? We Answer!
AIR MATH is EVERYWHERE 🌎!

🔷 Why Use It?

THE PERKS
1️⃣ It’s HUGE ♾️!
2️⃣ It’s EASY 🍰!
3️⃣ It’s FAST ⚡!
4️⃣ It’s REAL-TIME ⏰!
5️⃣ It’s SMART 🤖!
6️⃣ It’s KIND 💘!

►1️⃣ What’s so HUGE? Over +10M Math Question DB 💽 Available
AIR MATH possesses over +10M math questions on its DB.
What’s even better is that they’re all available both on the mobile and the web!
There is almost no question that cannot be resolved with this convenient extension.
Got questions?

►2️⃣ What’s so EASY? AI Education Technology + AI Photo Recognition 📸
Simply screenshot the problem you can’t solve.
Our authentic AI tech will scan and auto-recognize the problem
(incl. word problems) and provide various solutions to help you study.
How much easier can it get?

►3️⃣ What’s so FAST? Time Efficient – In a Blink of an Eye 😉
Oh! Did our AI-based solutions still not solve your problem?
Then you can also choose to have one of our live tutors explain your question in less than five minutes!
Is that Mach 7 🏎️ or what?

►4️⃣ What’s provided in REAL-TIME? Live Chat with Tutors 🧑‍🏫
Feel free to ask! Our expert tutors from across the globe are ready 24/7 to reply with a step-by-step explanation to your homework.
Our live chat features will enable you to connect with tutors regardless of the time and get an answer within minutes!
Wanna chat 🗨️, anyone?

►5️⃣ What’s so SMART? Word 💬 Problem Recognition
Relax. There’s no need to worry about whether the extension will recognize your word problems!
This web version of the homework helper and scanner will recognize any word problem and process it into an equation ➕➖✖️➗ for you.
Word (problem) up?

►6️⃣ What’s so KIND? User-Friendly Interface 📱
It’s actually quite easy to navigate 🧭.
Just click and drag, then let our extension take care of the hard work!
Simple yet convenient, right?

🔷 About AIR MATH
AIR MATH is a math homework helper powered by AI that helps you solve all those difficult questions; be it your school studies, geometry homework, or test prep.
This mobile app and Chrome extension will give you easy, simple walk-throughs of your school assignment.
There are also tutors waiting to solve your scanned questions 24/7. With the live chat feature, you can always ask a tutor to help you solve problems (even word problems) with a thorough step-by-step solution.
What used to be only available on mobile devices is now also available on the web as a Chrome extension!
So, what are you waiting for? Come study with us! Solve away!

► MAIN FEATURES
- Our own authentic AI tech
- 1:1 live chat service with expert tutors, ready 24/7 to help with your questions
- AI photo scanner recognizes word problems instantly: apt for assignments and test-preps
- All provided FREE OF CHARGE

► Topics Covered
Basic Math
Pre-Algebra: Arithmetic, proportional, integers, fractions, decimal numbers, powers, roots, factors, complex numbers
Algebra: Linear equations/inequalities, quadratic equations/inequalities, logarithms, functions, graphing, polynomials
Geometry: Plane/solid geometry, constructions, measurement formulas, formal proofs
Precalculus: Identities, logarithmic functions, exponential functions, trigonometric functions, series and sequences, probability, statistics, limits, derivatives
Trigonometry: Circular and periodic functions
Calculus: Series, limits, derivatives, integration, differentiation
Statistics: Combinations, permutation, factorials
Discrete Mathematics
Finite Mathematics
Differential Equations

We cover diverse math subjects from high school to college math!

🔷 Website 🌐
https://www.airmath.com

🔷 Inquiries ❓:
E-mail: student@airmath.com
